title: Content Assistant for Masculine Instagram Brand (Video Editing + Canva + Insta360)
job_overview:
We’re building a powerful, anonymous Instagram brand focused on masculinity, fitness, discipline, and real transformation.
The brand features real-life footage, curated visuals, original quotes, and voiceovers — all designed to inspire high-performing men.

I’m looking for a reliable, detail-oriented content assistant to:
 • Take raw footage (Insta360 + iPhone) and turn it into polished content
 • Add subtitles, transitions, and overlays using tools like CapCut and Canva
 • Apply my visual brand consistently (e.g., logo overlay, first-frame optimization)
 • Organize media and prepare a daily posting cadence (1 9-grid post + 3–5 story or reel posts/day)
 • Optionally assist with basic carousel formatting and caption layout (text provided)

Important Requirements:
 • Must understand Instagram formats (Reels, Carousels, Highlights, etc.)
 • Must know how to create scroll-stopping first frames
 • Familiar with Insta360 footage workflows and editing
 • Able to blur or anonymize faces when needed to preserve privacy (critical)
 • Bonus if you can help maintain consistency across platforms (e.g., X/Twitter)

Tools You’ll Use:
 • Canva
 • CapCut or Adobe Premiere
 • Instagram (posting + prep for approval)
 • Google Drive / Dropbox (media exchange)
 • Optional: InShot, VN, Descript (your choice, if efficient)

You Might Be a Great Fit If…
 • You care about fitness, mindset, personal growth, or masculine self-discipline
 • You’ve edited for faceless brands, influencers, or YouTubers before
 • You’re fast, organized, and prefer clear communication with minimal drama
 • You want long-term, meaningful remote work with a consistent rhythm

Work Details:
 • Part-Time: ~15-20 hours/week (could grow over time)
 • Flexible hours, but 2–3 hours overlap with Singapore time is preferred
 • Pay: 20,000–30,000 PHP/month depending on experience
 • Start Date: Immediately

How to Apply:

Send:
 1. Your 2 best Instagram-style edits
 2. Please send a short video (1–2 minutes) explaining why you’re the best person to help build the Wingman brand — and how your skills and mindset align with what we’ve shared.
 3. Tell me your favorite editing tool and why.
